parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description: The number of the page to return.

parameters.name: CveId
parameters.description: The Common Vulnerabilities and Exposures (CVE) ID of the vulnerability.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page.

parameters.name: RaspDefend
parameters.description:
Indicates whether the application protection feature is supported. Valid values:

- **0**: no.

- **1**: yes.

parameters.name: VulType
parameters.description:
The type of the vulnerabilities. Valid values:

*   **cve**: Linux software vulnerability.
*   **sys**: Windows system vulnerability.
*   **app**: Application vulnerability that is detected by using web scanner.
